description: dfu-util is a host side implementation of the DFU 1.0 and DFU 1.1 specifications of the USB forum. DFU is intended to download and upload firmware to/from devices connected over USB.
summary: dfu-util is a host side implementation of the DFU 1.0 and DFU 1.1 specifications of the USB forum.
author: Harald Welte,  Stefan Schmidt,  and Tormod Volden.
